definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Hear to do "paper flowers open" experiment, I tickled.
sentences.chinese: 听说要做“纸花开了”的实验，我乐坏了。

sentences.english: These paper flowers are made by students.
sentences.chinese: 这些纸花是学生们做的。

sentences.english: She made the paper flowers the whole night.
Up your gift-wrapping game with these stunning paper flowers.
sentences.chinese: 拿着这些纸花做些包装游戏吧。

sentences.english: Her achievement had crowds flinging confetti and chanting in Iraqi streets.
sentences.chinese: 她的成就使得伊拉克的群众在街上抛掷纸花，喊叫。

sentences.english: Yang Ling can make , but I .
sentences.chinese: 杨玲会做纸花，可是我不会。

sentences.english: There were in the garden beautiful paper flowers and a pool made of a piece of glass.
sentences.chinese: 花园里有美丽的纸花和一片玻璃打造的水池。

sentences.english: Up your gift-wrapping game with these stunning paper flowers.
sentences.chinese: 用这些美丽的纸花包装你的礼物吧。

sentences.english: The Christmas tree was decorated with lights, paper flowers and small gifts.
sentences.chinese: 我们用灯，纸花及小礼物来装饰圣诞树。

sentences.english: She was making the paper flowers the whole night.
sentences.chinese: 她是使纸花了整整一夜。

sentences.english: Nothing in the paper flowers twists and turns of familiar to the people in the building.
sentences.chinese: 虎子以大家都熟悉的纸花折法向小楼里的人报平安。

sentences.english: One idea for an origami wedding craft idea is to fold paper flowers to use as decorative pieces.
sentences.chinese: 一个用于婚礼折纸工艺思想观念是折叠纸花作装饰件。

sentences.english: I am busy making paper flowers.
They are making paper flowers for the Children's Day.
sentences.chinese: 他们在为儿童节做纸花。

sentences.english: We speak in cold and we send little messages , origami .
sentences.chinese: 我们用冷冰冰的方式，发信息，传纸花。

sentences.english: Split up a wreath of paper flowers, and pin those flowers inside a tent.
sentences.chinese: 把一个花圈分解开，把纸花都钉在一个帐篷内壁。

definition: papercutting (Chinese folk art)/to make paper cutouts
paper dolls for ritual use in the shape of people or animals
a small bag full of fragrance used on Dragon boat Festival
